page.title: 13Religion
page.content: Father John is a priest with white hair, a white beard and black square glasses. He wears a white collar, a long black robe and a necklace with a metal cross. He cares about the Church which nearly always needs repairing.Studham Church was started by Uff in 1220. It has some stained glass windows depicting Bible stories. The glass is brightly coloured mostly green, yellow, blue,purple and red. There are wooden pews and many hand stitched kneelers. At the back of the Church is a room where the bells are rung.The tower has 4 old bells _ Numbers 1and 2 dated 1666,Number 3 inscribed"Pries the Lord 1599" and Number 4" God save the King 1627".Father John does not teach scripture at Studham school as the Rev Brown did in the early 1900's _Louise
